trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SEQ_00<tab>A certain culinary device is in need of repairs, and the desperate look in Managingway's eyes can only portend one thing.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the Loporrit mechanic in the Carrotorium.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested item to the Loporrit mechanic.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SEQ_03<tab>Report to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Loporrit mechanic in the Carrotorium.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to the Loporrit mechanic)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_TODO_02<tab>Report to Managingway.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>The cooking station has been a smashing success since its grand opening, and I couldn't be more pleased! ...Well, perhaps I <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> be more pleased should the others stop clambering over one another just to get a taste of Cookingway's culinary twists on the traditional carrot.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>Unfortunately, his indispensable carrot chiller has broken down amidst the overwhelming demand, and many of us─myself included─wish for it to be repaired posthaste. The drop in productivity the workshop suffers in its absence is not to be borne.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, have you heard? Oh, it's just awful─the carrot chiller you helped to repair has broken down again!

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>As you're aware, the cooking station's frozen beverages are the talk of the hold, and nary a soul can keep their paws off of them. Hence, the carrot chiller is─or rather <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> in perpetual use. Inventingway himself is seeing if he can refine the design to prevent this from happening again.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_004<tab>One of our Ways in charge of overseeing repairs has already gone to inspect it, but surely the process would go faster if you were there to assist them. I urge you to meet with them in the Carrotorium as soon as you are able.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_000_005<tab><beep> Hello! Do you have any instructions? This supporter <var 1A 02 /var>loves<var 1A 01 /var> instructions!

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_010<tab>What's that? You'll help me with the repairs? Oh, how very kind of you! Well then, give me just a moment to figure out how to distribute the remaining tasks.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_011<tab>Let's see here... Well, the cooling mechanism has seen better days. With your expertise, I wager you could make a suitable replacement in no time. Think you can put one together with these parts?

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_012<tab>Let's see here... Well, the chiller's insulative fabric has deteriorated a good deal, but I have all the necessary materials to stitch a few more yalms together. Think you could manage that?

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_013<tab>Let's see here... Well, the coolant for the chiller seems to have degraded. With your expertise, I wager you could make a much more effective one in no time. Think you can manage that with these ingredients?

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_020<tab><beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_021<tab><beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_022<tab><beep> You require materials? But you have plenty already! Just think of how those poor materials would feel if they went perpetually unused. Go on, think about it.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_023<tab><beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_024<tab><beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SUPPORTER04702_100_025<tab><beep> Oh, do you require additional materials? Acknowledged, acknowledged! Just give this supporter a moment to fire up its transfer protocols!
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_026<tab>If you run out of materials, the supporter beside me will be able to resupply you with whatever you need.
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_030<tab>Oh, have you finished?
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_031<tab>M-My word, this is absolutely remarkable! Fine work, my friend, fine work!

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_032<tab>I will set about getting the chiller up and running again with what you've made. Pray return to Managingway and let them know it will soon be in working order!
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_LOPORRIT04702_000_033<tab>Fret not, I shall see to the carrot chiller's repairs. You need but return to Managingway and let them know it shall soon be in working order!

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_040<tab>Oh, that's wonderful news, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. It sounds like the machine will be ready much sooner than we'd anticipated. I cannot thank you enough.

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_041<tab>Why does the carrot chiller see such fierce demand, you ask? Well, allow me to answer your question with another: how would <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> react to a delicious beverage comprised of pulverized chilled carrots?

TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_MANAGINGWAY_000_042<tab>I thought so. The staff at the cooking station can even combine your favorite carrots and blend them into an original drink to keep you alert and refreshed─or whatever else you fancy, I suppose. Hmmm, perhaps I should put in my next order sooner rather than later...
TEXT_BANLOP116_04702_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
